name: Vintage 1.50ct White Gold Diamond Solitaire Engagement Ring 1.5ct
description:
This is an extremely beautiful and impressive 18K white gold solitaire diamond ring. The central stone is a large brilliant cut 1.50ct diamond and measures 7.5mm across.

The ring boasts a stunning 1.50ct natural diamond which has been cut perfectly to show off its full brilliance. The diamond is colourless (F), which gives the diamond its intense white sparkle and the clarity is S1, which is very good. The claw setting of the ring as also been set with 8 small beautiful diamonds which is a really unique feature. The gold is fully hallmarked and stamped. 

The ring is in extremely good condition with no scratches or marks. This was a very well looked after ring. 

Comes with a lovely varnished wooden and leather display ring box. 

This really is everything you would want a diamond ring to be at a fraction of the high street price! 

Size N or 6 3/4 US size (Could easily be resized)
RRP £6,000 + 

Any questions please do send me an email.

For many more photos visit-

http://s121.photobucket.com/albums/o206/ja_t_uk/Diamond%20Ring/

name: Vintage 0.50ct White Gold Solitaire Diamond Ring with Channel Diamond Shoulders
description:
This is a very elegant and classic 14K white gold solitaire diamond ring. The central brilliant cut natural diamond is 0.5ct surrounded by channel set round brilliant cut graduating diamond shoulders. The ring is unmarked but tests at 14K white gold. 

The ring boasts a stunning 0.50ct natural diamond which has been cut perfectly to show off its full brilliance. The diamond is a very high clarity (VS2) and is almost colourless (N-0) which gives this diamond a flawless brilliance. The ring is in extremely good condition with no scratches or damage. 

Comes with neat display case! 
Size size L 1/2 or 4.1/2 US 
Any questions please do send me an email.

FOR A VIDEO OF THIS RING PLEASE VISIT: http://youtu.be/TVoNEjL1JjE

name: Beautiful Vintage 9K Gold Baby Blue Topaz and Diamond Cocktail Ring
description:
This is an elegant 9K gold ring set with a flawless teardrop baby blue topaz stone and surrounded by a crest of small briliant cut diamonds set in a decorative platinum fan design.

This is a truly stunning ring which could be used an everyday ring or a stunning cocktail ring. It was bought at auction and was listed as being made in England in the 1940s (Art Deco).

The ring is fully stamped and hallmarked, 9K.

The Topaz stone measures: 
Length 
Width 

The ring is in extremely good condition with no scratches to the stones or gold. 

Comes with neat display case! 
Size N (US 6.5)
RRP £400

For more pictures please visit:
